description.content: This endpoint creates a new article entity as well as related chapters, paragraphs and code sections
This endpoint returns a list of all articles without related entities
This endpoint returns a single article along with all the related entities
This endpoint returns a single article along with all the related entities
This endpoint adds a like to an article
This endpoint removes a like to an article
This endpoint receives an email and a password and after validating them, returns a jwt token with the encrypted user infos
This endpoint receives an email and a password and creates a new user if email is not already present

response.name: User succesfully created and logged in

description.content: This endpoint returns the currently logged in user info
This endpoint creates a new comment entity
This endpoint returns a list of all comments without their replies
This endpoint returns a single comment with its replies
